content:
Hello there We have read the question We try to help



To start solving the problem, you can try clearing your computer's cache and also clearing your Thunderbird software's cache.

Do you still see this information on your tabs for at least a second just before closing? It could be your session.json.file that might need a refresh or suffered a crash today. Apparently this clearly presents itself as a crashed topic at the moment where use of these tabs via Thunderbird is used by them and is ultimately written normally to the session.json files, which in turn is a clear problem when used with its Firefox software. another process name is where it is the sessionstore.js. This is simply written away and not at the last moment of use, as with the Thunderbird software.


Greetings Firefox volunteer
creator: Googlethunderbird

content:
Hello there

You can try to delete these files regarding session.json and the adjacent xulstore.json then try to restart Thunderbird if needed. you can also try to enable the read only option on these files box and leave it off in the settings in this environment of these settings of session.json and xulstore.json

Greetings Firefox volunteer
creator: Googlethunderbird

creator: Googlethunderbird

content:
That will be your antivirus using an uncertified self signed certificate. You can manually add it if you have implicit trust in your antivirus vendor to have access to all of your encrypted connections. Or you might want to look at an product that does not require such access.

Regardless, if you want to add it, your antivirus vendor will have instructions.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Have you tried creating an exception in the antivirus for your Thunderbird profile folder?
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Check to see if you have thunderbird set for offline. File>Offline

content:
WAIT! On my bottom bar, my tb button, allows me to click on a page that has a bar at the top that shows: address book, add-ons manager, cardbook preferences, account settings. So we know, my address books are not lost!!!

My goal is to use cardbook to do searches of my contacts to find people that my memory just can't dredge up.

How do i incorporate ALL personal address books with cardbook addon to do that? Thank you and if you can tell me how to easily find my address books instead of just discovering them like i did, that would be wonderful too!!!!
creator: bullishbob

creator: MattAuSupport

content: It doesn't appear that you were paying attention when you installed Cardbook. The first thing it does is exactly what you requested - combining all addressbooks. I attached a sample of what screens you would have seen. I also attached a screenshot of what you should see at tools>cardbook, where there is a PREFERENCES menu to allow any special settings.
creator: davidsk

content: Vai in tasto menu > Impostazioni > generale > Lingua e aspetto > Caratteri e colori > [Colori...] qui scegli il colore che vuoi usare per il testo e per lo sfondo poi spunta la voce Utilizza colori personalizzati Infine per la casella Sostituisci i colori specificati (...) imposta il valore Sempre
creator: @next
